address: 4050 rue de Celles, Montreal, QC H1S 1S3, Canada
notes: Canadian leader in natural actives, now part of IFF (International Flavors & Fragrances). Key products include Elestan™ (natural elastin alternative from soy), Tightening Peptides (plant-based peptide complexes), and Redensyl™ (hair and skin density active with firming benefits). Strong sustainability commitment with COSMOS/ECOCERT/NATRUE approved ingredients. Non-GMO certification. Premium natural positioning with technical expertise.
